import re
with open\(''C:/Users/snowz/Documents/web/-k--main/index.html'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    lines = f.readlines\(\)

# Find lines with Chinese characters outside the script block \(1-15539 and 63517+\)
chinese_range = list\(range\(0, 15539\)\) + list\(range\(63516, len\(lines\)\)\)
results = []
for i in chinese_range:
    line = lines[i]
    if re.search\(r''[\\u4e00-\\u9fff]'', line\):
        results.append\(\(i+1, line.rstrip\(\)\)\)

for lineno, content in results[:60]:
    print\(f''{lineno}: {content}''\)
